Architectural Smell Detection
===========================

The Architectural Smell Detector identifies design and architectural issues in Python projects.

Detected Smells
-------------

* Hub-like Dependencies
* Scattered Functionality
* Cyclic Dependencies
* God Objects
* Unstable Dependencies
* Improper API Usage
* Redundant Abstractions

Usage
-----

Command Line
^^^^^^^^^^^

.. code-block:: bash

   analyze_code_quality /path/to/project --type architectural

Python API
^^^^^^^^^

.. code-block:: python

   from code_quality_analyzer import ArchitecturalSmellDetector
   
   detector = ArchitecturalSmellDetector(thresholds)
   detector.detect_smells('/path/to/project')
   detector.print_report()
